items.title: Transcript Extraction Core
items.description: E-001: Core functionality to extract full transcript from YouTube video. Transcript is extracted in full, preserving fidelity of the user-selected source. Transcript text is copied directly to the clipboard. No local storage. No restrictions are imposed on transcript provenance by the product.

items.title: Minimal Control Injection
items.description: E-002: Chrome extension injected control in YouTube player. Location: right-side player control cluster, positioned as close as possible to the Closed Captions control. Visibility: icon only, no label. Interaction: single click. Feedback: none. The control must visually read as a peer to Closed Captions, not playback or settings.

items.title: Clipboard Handling
items.description: E-003: Copy transcript text directly to clipboard using Chrome extension APIs. No local storage. No retries, confirmations, or fallbacks.

items.title: Configuration and Settings
items.description: E-004: Anti-feature. No settings. No UI panels. No user-modifiable behavior. Zero configuration. This epic is explicitly marked as WON'T DO per the PRD anti-features.

items.title: UI Feedback and Messaging
items.description: E-005: Anti-feature. No acknowledgements, confirmations, or previews. No onboarding or education. Silent success and silent failure. This epic is explicitly marked as WON'T DO per the PRD anti-features.

items.title: Click control to copy full transcript to clipboard
items.description:
US-001: As a power user, I can click a control and have the full transcript copied to my clipboard.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given a YouTube video with a retrievable transcript,
- When I click the control,
- Then the full transcript text is placed on my clipboard.
- And no UI element appears.
- And no confirmation is shown.

items.title: No interruption or guidance during use
items.description:
US-002: As a power user, I am not interrupted or guided during use.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given any state of the extension,
- When the core action is performed,
- Then no prompts, dialogs, or explanations are rendered.

items.title: Control always available on YouTube video pages
items.description:
US-003: As a power user, I can rely on the control being always available.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Given a standard YouTube video page,
- When the player loads,
- Then the control is present without user configuration.
